name: Colossus Wolf Runner
description:
(Jogo disponível em também em pt-Br)

Stop at nothing. Go fast! Heavy metal screaming in your ears. 

Kill the Colossal guardians to unleash Giger, The Terror, from his cage and kill him. Not for the good of every living being, Wolf is no hero, but for revenge and to finally quench his anger. 

Colossus Wolf Runner is a first-person platformer in which you race through buildings linked to Colossal creatures to obtain the Crystals while listening  to an awesome soundtrack by XTaKeRuX.
